= Projects that use Git for their source code management. =
If your project is not listed, please add it here.

List does not currently include [[Git]], [[Cogito]] and other git-related tools.

== Kernel-related projects that use Git for their source code management. ==
* Linux Kernel
** http://kernel.org
** http://git.kernel.org/?p=linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux-2.6.git (gitweb)
* Linux/MIPS (port of Linux to the MIPS architecture)
** http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Git (description, includes repository URLs)
** http://www.linux-mips.org/git (gitweb)
* NFS client patches for Linux
** http://linux-nfs.org/ (homepage)
** http://linux-nfs.org/cgi-bin/gitweb.cgi (gitweb)
* OpenVZ (Operating System-level server virtualization solution)
** http://openvz.org/ (homepage)
** http://git.openvz.org/ (repository, gitweb)
* Nico Schottelius (Linux|Unix) projects
** http://linux.schottelius.org/ (homepage)
** http://linux.schottelius.org/cgi-bin/gitweb.cgi (gitweb)
* Open<code><nowiki></nowiki></code>Fabrics Alliance (Infini<code><nowiki></nowiki></code>Band & other RDMA Network Fabric) drivers
** http://www.openfabrics.org/ (homepage)
** http://www.openfabrics.org/git/ (gitweb)
* Many other Linux related projects...
** http://git.kernel.org/ (gitweb)
